Name: Rushberry Mercs
About the game: Rushberry Mining Inc. hire new space miners : To pass the test you need to mine more berrydium than the other contenders in less than 2:30 minutes. Actual game features : up to 4 players. Competitive IA to replace missing players. fully destructible environment, mine it with missiles to find berrydium fast-paced sessions 12 shop options to choose from on each game. 4x characters with 2 exclusive shop options each.
